html.p: If you have any feedback, (positive or negative) feel free to email splunk_help@sonicwall.com. The application is under active development. We need your feedback to know what to improve or develop. When a feature is functioning well for you, please let us know.

The $SPLUNK_HOME/dsa/lookups/sonicwall_firewall.csv lookup file does not include your firewall IP/name in it. To fix this, manually run the SonicWALL Firewalls Report as detailed in the installation instructions.
html.h2: Total data sent does not appear correct
html.p: There is a known bug present in the 6.x versions where connections that have timed out (insted of FYN) are not reported through IPFix Connection Closed. We are working on making the bug fix for this available. In the meantime, you should not consider the total data values accurate.
To see a non-zero number, you can download a test/sample virus payload to stimulate the firewall. For more information, see http://www.eicar.org/86-0-Intended-use.html.
